item.title: Comment Ã§a va?
item.description:
I had been deep in code for the preceding few days (mine and others') and had achieved a few insights by poring over actual code (vs. comments and/or commentary) when this quote crossed my radar:
Being an enthusiastic quote lover, I of course shared it on Twitter, not expecting the various interpretations it solicited. As an aside, this is what happens when you share something without a particular context: people rightfully supply their own.
